mainText:
To everyone mourning the passing of Steve Jobs, please be comforted in 
the faith inspired truth that all good things are eternal.

So, somewhere in heaven a group of especially talented souls are being 
spurred on by a fiery new entity to keep on being insanely great, and 
surely all creation will benefit.

Thank you, Steve, for what you did for this world and for what you're 
most likely doing for the next.
author: Dan
